approve.description: Allows a spender to withdraw from the caller’s account up to the amount specified.

transfer.description: Transfers tokens directly from the caller’s address to another address.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from one address to another on behalf of the sender.

burn.description: Burns tokens from a specified address.

mint.description: Mints new tokens to the specified address.

name.description: Retrieves the name of the token.

symbol.description: Retrieves the symbol of the token.

totalSupply.description: Retrieves the total supply of tokens.

decimals.description: Retrieves the number of decimal places used by the token.

balanceOf.description: Retrieves the balance of a specified address.

allowance.description: Retrieves the amount of tokens a spender is allowed to spend from the owner's account.

decreaseAllowance.description: Decreases the allowance for a spender.

increaseAllowance.description: Increases the allowance for a spender.

delegate.description: Delegates voting power to another address.

delegateBySig.description: Delegates voting power by a signed message.

delegates.description: Retrieves the delegate for a specified address.

getVotes.description: Retrieves the current voting power of an address.

getPastVotes.description: Retrieves the voting power of an address at a specific block number.

getPastTotalSupply.description: Retrieves the total supply of tokens at a specific block number.

checkpoints.description: Retrieves the checkpoints for a specific account and position.

nonces.description: Retrieves the current nonce for a specified address.

numCheckpoints.description: Retrieves the number of checkpoints for a specified address.

permit.description: Permits a spender to spend tokens on behalf of the owner, with a signed message.

grantRole.description: Grants a role to a specified address.

revokeRole.description: Revokes a role from a specified address.

renounceRole.description: Allows an account to renounce its role.

getRoleAdmin.description: Retrieves the admin role for a specified role.

getRoleMember.description: Retrieves a role member at a specific index.

getRoleMemberCount.description: Retrieves the number of members in a specified role.

supportsInterface.description: Checks if the contract supports a specific interface.

DOMAIN_SEPARATOR.description: Retrieves the domain separator used in permit signatures.

DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE.description: Retrieves the default admin role identifier.
